name: Night walker (Garnet_san)
description:
This game was made for Trijam #164 by 3 friends each spending less than 3 hours on development

How to play:

You play as slime that has weird movement abilities. During day it's only able to jump (arrow key up) and during nights it can walk (arrow keys left and right). Your goal is to reach platform with flag.

Credits:

Garnet: Programming, design

Guláš: Art

Lefty: Music
